duties_responsibilities.duty: Run daily HR functions, including hiring, interviewing, pay administration, benefits, and leave management.
Partner with management to direct safety initiatives and ensure compliance with laws, regulations, and company policies.
Ensure ethical conduct and compliance with regulatory requirements at all levels.
Deliver HR programs including compensation, benefits, leave, disciplinary matters, and talent management.
Recruit, interview, and facilitate hiring qualified job applicants; implement new hire orientation and employee recognition programs.
Handle employment-related inquiries, attend employee disciplinary meetings, and maintain compliance with employment laws and regulations.
Review and maintain knowledge of trends, best practices, regulatory changes, and new technologies in human resources.
Develop good employee communications, promote positive teamwork attitudes, and company culture.
Collaborate with management to promote company safety culture objectives, and develop, prepare, and implement training programs, policies, and procedures for a safe working environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related business
Two to three years of related experience is required
